title: Boscombe East and Pokesdown (ward)
text:
Boscombe East and Pokesdown is a ward in <a href="Bournemouth">Bournemouth</a>, <a href="Dorset">Dorset</a>. Since <a href="2019%20Bournemouth%2C%20Christchurch%20and%20Poole%20Council%20election">2019</a>, the ward has elected 2 councillors to <a href="Bournemouth%2C%20Christchurch%20and%20Poole%20Council">Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole Council</a>.
History.
The ward was formerly known as Boscombe East, which elected three councillors to <a href="Bournemouth%20Borough%20Council">Bournemouth Borough Council</a>.
Geography.
The ward includes the suburb of <a href="Pokesdown">Pokesdown</a>, and the eastern areas of <a href="Boscombe">Boscombe</a>.
